abstract: shanxi adds three national wetland parks .
article: three wetland parks in shanxi province have recently been included in a list of national wetland parks released by the state forestry administration . changyuan river , wenyu river and fenhe river have all been designated national wetland parks . at present , shanxi has 59 wetland parks with five national wetland parks , 14 pilot national wetland parks and 40 provincial wetland parks . changyuan river national wetland park in qixian county , jinzhong city , covers an area of 892.30 hectares with the wetland area covering 457.85 hectares . there are 250 species of animals , including those under special state protection like the black stork and golden eagle , and 457 species of plants in the park .

wenyu river national wetland park in jiaocheng county , lyuliang city , covers an area of 5,325.45 hectares , with a wetland area covering 1,833.48 hectares . there are 188 species of wild animals , including those under special state protection like the brown eared pheasant and leopard , and 261 species of plants in the park .
